messages.title: Faith
messages.content: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.

messages.title: Hope
messages.content: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.

messages.title: Gratitude
messages.content: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.

messages.title: Resilience
messages.content: Resilience is not about never falling, but about rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until itâ€™s done.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
